item.title: Natural Slender Pampas Grass
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Natural Slender Pampas Grass appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Dried Products

Natural Slender Pampas Grass

$25.00

Natural Slender Pampas Grass

$25.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Dried Products
Dried Flower Details

Delicate, slender, and dainty, this pampas grass is perfect for adding to fresh or dried flower bouquets, flower arrangements, wedding decorations, and home decor. This type of pampas has minimal shedding.

Size:

  • Plume 6.5” – 11” (16-28 cm)
  • Total Length: 70 – 75cm /stem
  • 50 grams (18-20 pieces/bundle)

Color:

  • Natural (reddish/burgundy/brown mix)
  • White/Cream

Pricing:

  • Per bundle

Package:

  • Vase not included
Dried Flower Care
  • When you receive your product, shake the stems gently outside to fluff the plumes.
  • Your pampas is likely to become compressed during shipping, take it outside and use a hot blow drier to re-fluff it.
  • This species has minimal shedding, but it will shed a bit when moved/blow-dried.
  • Handle with care as dried flowers are fragile.
  • Store stems upright.
  • Keep stems out of direct sunlight.
  • Refrain from getting stems wet.
  • Dried flowers are low maintenance and require very little care. Gently shake off dust occasionally to keep looking beautiful!
  • Gently separate stems when unpacking, as delicate stems can be prone to breakage.

Related products

  • Pink Palm Suns

    $42.00

  • Bunny Tails – White

    $20.00

  • Ruscus – White

    $38.00

  • White Palm Spears

    $18.00

The post Natural Slender Pampas Grass appeared first on You Floral.

item.title: Pink Pampas
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post Pink Pampas appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Dried Products

Pink Pampas

$95.00

Pink Pampas

$95.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Dried Products
Dried Flower Details

Huge, fluffy, and luxurious; this pampas is sure to make a statement wherever you display it.

Size:

  • Plume length approx. 30”
  • Total length (including plume) approx. 44”

Color:

  • Cotton candle color pink (dyed)

Pricing:

  • Per bundle (5 stems/bundle)

Package:

  • Vase not included
Dried Flower Care
  • When you receive your product, shake the stems gently outside to fluff the plumes.
  • Your pampas is likely to become compressed during shipping, take it outside and use a hot blow drier to re-fluff it.
  • It’s normal that your pampas will shed when moved/blow-dried.
  • If you are nervous about shedding you can apply a light dusting of hairspray.
  • Handle with care as dried flowers are fragile.
  • Store stems upright.
  • Keep stems out of direct sunlight.
  • Refrain from getting stems wet.

Related products

  • Nigella

    $18.00

  • Aveena

    $35.00

  • Wheat – White

    $35.00

  • Bunny Tails – White

    $20.00

Jequirity

$24.00

Jequirity

$24.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Dried Products
Dried Flower Details

If you’re looking for something with loads of texture and uniqueness, jequirity is perfect for you! The small bloom size make it great for boutonnieres.

Size:

  • 27” – 31” total length (70-80cm)
  • 500 – 70g/ bundle
  • Package size: 70X15X15 cm

Color:

  • Tan/Off White

Pricing:

  • Per bundle

Package:

  • Vase not included
Dried Flower Care
  • Handle with care as dried flowers are fragile.
  • Fern has a tendency to break when handled, so be very gentle.
  • Store stems upright.
  • Keep stems out of direct sunlight.
  • Refrain from getting stems wet.
  • Dried flowers are low maintenance and require very little care. Gently shake off dust occasionally to keep looking beautiful!
  • Gently separate stems when unpacking, as delicate stems can be prone to breakage.

Dried Flower Details

Also known as billy balls, these flowers are naturally colored yellow, before being color treated. Their unique texture is great for boutineers and bridal bouquets.

 Size:

  • Diameter of flower head is approximately ½”
  • approximately 20 flower heads per bundle

Color:

  • Bleached white

Pricing:

Dried Flower Care

  • Refrain from getting stems wet.
  • Dried flowers are low maintenance and require very little care. Gently shake off dust occasionally to keep looking beautiful!
  • Gently separate stems when unpacking, as delicate stems can be prone to breakage.

Eryngium

$24.00

Eryngium

$24.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Dried Products
Dried Flower Details

Also known as thistle, eryngium adds texture and a unique flair to your arrangements and decor

Size:

  • Total length 20-22” (50-55cm)
  • Package size: 60X15X15 cm
  • Weight: Approximately 40 grams/pack

Color:

  • Bleached white

Pricing:

  • Per bundle

Package:

  • Vase not included
Dried Flower Care
  • Handle with care as dried flowers are fragile.
  • Eryngium gets compressed while shipping, gently tease apart the blooms to get it back into shape.
  • Store stems upright.
  • Keep stems out of direct sunlight.
  • Refrain from getting stems wet.
  • Dried flowers are low maintenance and require very little care. Gently shake off dust occasionally to keep looking beautiful!
  • Gently separate stems when unpacking, as delicate stems can be prone to breakage.

item.title: White Preserved Roses
item.dc:creator: user
item.description: The post White Preserved Roses appeared first on You Floral.
item.content:encoded:
Home / Dried Products

White Preserved Roses

$56.00

White Preserved Roses

$56.00

Shipping calculated at checkout.

Category: Dried Products
Dried Flower Details

Preserved roses are a great addition to a dried bouquet, they essentially last forever and no one will be able to tell that they aren’t real! They are sold by the flower head only, so you’ll need to attach them to a stem (either by wiring or glueing)

Color:

  • Khaki (similar to quicksand rose)
  • White

Pricing:

  • Per box (6 roses)
Dried Flower Care
  • Preserved roses tend to become dry and brittle in dry environments, so keep away from exposure to heaters.
  • Keep away from direct light or close to artificial light.
  • Do not exposure the roses to water or high humidity areas (i.e. bathrooms)
  • Preserved roses will last up to three years

Related products

  • Mega Luxe Pampas Grass

    $60.00 – $95.00

  • Pink Palm Spears

    $18.00

  • Wheat – White

    $35.00

  • Nigella

    $18.00

The post White Preserved Roses appeared first on You Floral.
